mapper.insert: insert into db_updatedescripation (SID, SHOPID, ITEMID, FLAG, SITE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, UPDATETIME, CHECKFLAG, CHECKOPER, CHECKOPERTIME, DESCR, ERRORDESCR) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{errordescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_updatedescripation set SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKOPERTIME = #{checkopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ERRORDESCR = #{errordescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, SHOPID, ITEMID, FLAG, SITE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, UPDATETIME, CHECKFLAG, CHECKOPER, CHECKOPERTIME, DESCR, ERRORDESCR from db_updatedescripation where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SID, SHOPID, ITEMID, FLAG, SITE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, UPDATETIME, CHECKFLAG, CHECKOPER, CHECKOPERTIME, DESCR, ERRORDESCR from db_updatedescripation
